section.p: The use-case is that the database has been modeled with an external tool – in this case Toad Data Modeler – and the description of a specific entity needs to be included into a DITA document to have only a single document for the complete functional specification.
This is solved with XSLT-Conref by passing the data model as XML source and specifying the name of the entity as custom parameter.
When the specified entity name was not found in the file an author hint will be generated.
